SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gamestate

Class ServerGameState

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gamestate.ServerGameState
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ServerGameState extends Object implements Serializable
Represents the server-side state of the game, including player information, card placements, objectives, decks, market state, and current game progress. This class is serializable to JSON format for saving and loading game states.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • ServerGameState

      public ServerGameState(int lobbyId) throws IOException
      Constructs a ServerGameState by loading the game state from a JSON file identified by the provided lobby ID.
      Parameters:
      lobbyId - The ID of the lobby from which to load the game state.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs during loading.

    • ServerGameState

      public ServerGameState(int lobbyId, List<PlayerColor> gameOrder, List<String> players, List<PlayerField> fields, List<Integer> scores, List<Objective> personalObjectives, List<PlayableCard[]> hands, Objective[] commonObjectives, GoldDeck goldDeck, ResourceDeck resourceDeck, PlayableCard[] market, PlayerColor currentPlayer, boolean lastLap)
      Constructs a ServerGameState with the provided game state parameters and saves it to a JSON file identified by the lobby ID.
      Parameters:
      lobbyId - The ID of the lobby to which this game state belongs.
      gameOrder - The list of player colors representing the order of turns in the game.
      players - The list of player usernames.
      fields - The list of player fields, containing card placements and their positions.
      scores - The list of player scores.
      personalObjectives - The list of personal objectives for each player.
      hands - The list of hands (arrays of playable cards) for each player.
      commonObjectives - The common objectives shared among all players.
      goldDeck - The deck of gold cards.
      resourceDeck - The deck of resource cards.
      market - The array of cards available in the market.
      currentPlayer - The current player taking their turn.
      lastLap - Indicates if it is the last lap of the game.
